    Annotating Treatments Pipeline

    treatment_pipeline.Rmd

    THIS VIGNETTE IS A WORK IN PROGRESS 

    library(AnnotationGx)
    
data(ctrp_treatmentIDs)
treatmentMetadata <- ctrp_treatmentIDs[1:5]
treatmentMetadata
#>       CTRP.treatmentid CTRP.broad_cpd_id
#>                 <char>            <char>
#> 1:               CIL55     BRD-K46556387
#> 2:             BRD4132     BRD-K86574132
#> 3:             BRD6340     BRD-K35716340
#> 4:               ML006     BRD-K89692698
#> 5: Bax channel blocker     BRD-A18763547
names_to_cids <- AnnotationGx::mapCompound2CID(treatmentMetadata$CTRP.treatmentid, first = TRUE) 
    
sources <- getUnichemSources()
#> <httr2_url> https://www.ebi.ac.uk/unichem/api/v1/sources
#> • scheme: https
#> • hostname: www.ebi.ac.uk
#> • path: /unichem/api/v1/sources
response <- queryUnichem(
  type = "sourceID", 
  compound = names_to_cids[1, cids], 
  sourceID = sources[Name == "pubchem", SourceID]
) 
#> <httr2_url> https://www.ebi.ac.uk/unichem/api/v1/compounds
#> • scheme: https
#> • hostname: www.ebi.ac.uk
#> • path: /unichem/api/v1/compounds
#> <httr2_url> https://www.ebi.ac.uk/unichem/api/v1/sources
#> • scheme: https
#> • hostname: www.ebi.ac.uk
#> • path: /unichem/api/v1/sources
#> <httr2_request>
#> POST https://www.ebi.ac.uk/unichem/api/v1/compounds
#> Body: json encoded data
#> Policies:
#> • retry_max_tries: 3
#> • error_is_error: a function

response
#> $External_Mappings
#>        compoundID             Name                          NameLong sourceID
#>            <char>           <char>                            <char>    <int>
#> 1:   CHEMBL492468           chembl                            ChEMBL        1

#> 6:       PD003650 probes_and_drugs                  Probes And Drugs       49
